post:
Magento eCommerce Software (Community Edition)
Magento is an open source e-commerce web application that was launched on March 31, 2008.

The service includes:
- Setup of Linux, Apache, Mysql & PHP
- Installation and setup of Firewall
- Setup iRedMail software to easy manage emails via control panel
- Optimisation of web server to run the Magento smoothly
- Installation and setup of Magento software
- Backup of VPS account
- XEN VPS with the following specifications:

1 Root SSL Certificate: Yes
Control Panel: Magento & iRedMail
